subject: Payment Transfer Update
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL
ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.

            Appreciations on your quick response.

Attention; Melanie

An error was discovered in our payment database and we sincerely apologize
for the mix-up for not have received your accrued interest fund while
noting strongly that course it,

In a nutshell, we will pay your funds through our paying bank here in
America.

You are advised to provide a copy of your id,Address and Phone number to
reach you for the processing of your payment.

Awaiting for your urgent response while we trust that you will cooperate
with us to finally receive your fund.

Thanks in anticipation.

Sincerely,

Theresa Brown (Ms.)
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme (UNGAAP)

subject: Re: Payment Transfer Update
body:
Hello Theresa Brown Ms.,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this accrued interest fund. Could you please provide more details about it? How did this error occur in your payment database?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the United Nation Grant Allocation Programme (UNGAAP)? I'm not familiar with it and would love to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Melanie

subject: Clarification
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL
ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.

Attn: Melanie.

Acknowledged is the receipt of your message.

Your accrued interest fund emanated from your original total principal fund
that you were unable to claim for a very long time now due to you're
financially incapacitated.

Now, we deem it necessary to calculate from your principal total sum, the
accumulated interest since it started being in the bank custody till date
and we came to the total of US$587,491.00 as your total interest fund.

 Hence, the interest fund was now approved for you to receive it first via
our paying bank (GOLDEN BANK OF AMERICA) and then use it to claim your
total principal sum that is still in the bank.

However, do make haste for us to start processing your accrued interest
fund because it has a specific time frame for us to start off now and it is
only the IMF CLEARANCE required from you to claim this funds,so i urge you
to make sure you provide clearance or you pay a token of $3,250 to obtain
it to enable a lawyer procured the clearance and you receive your payment
from the bank without paying any fee.

Thanks for your understanding.

Sincerely,

Theresa Brown (Ms.)
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programmed (UNGAAP)
